charges.charge_description: 21:846=MD.F: 21 U.SC. 846,841(a)(1) &; (b)(l)(B) - Conspiracy to possess with Intent to distribute 100 kilograms or more of marijuana(1)

charges.charge_disposition: It is ordered the defendant shall pay a special assessment of $100.00. Defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for 63 months. Upon release, defendant shall be on supervised release for 4 years. ON MAY 29, 2015 DEFENDANT WAS REVOKED and resentenced to 6 months BOP and 12 months Supervised Release.
